article: The world is an interesting place. Different people like different things. Some people like loud music. Other people don't. They like  _  music. Many people like sports, but they do not  all like  the same sports. In some countries, cricket is a very popular sport. In others it is not popular  _  all. No one plays it or watches it on TV.  _  , most people like soccer. The World Cup is very popular.  _  of people watch the games on TV. Different people like different  _  . Some people do not like meat. They eat fruit and vegetables most of the time. Some people do not like  _  or bread. They prefer rice. Not everyone likes the same color. Most people have their favorite colors. Some people like  _  colors. Others prefer dark colors. Many people like  _  . Different people like different places. Some people like to go to the country. They like fresh air. Some people like to go to cities because they like  _  . Some other people enjoy beautiful places like mountains or beaches. What do you like? Have you got an idea?
